div.div: WE'RE CONVINCED THE ZAGATS ARE TO BLAME SOMEHOW

div.a: Your Klout Score Must Be Greater Than 35 To Read This

div.div: Hated by some, social scores are becoming the new normal on the web.

li.div: “We're working hard to try & avoid building a douchebag machine” Can't argue with @marshallk's goals for @getlittlebird http://t.co/lXmqDyCb

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TbwNv3&via=Digg&text=Your Klout Score Must Be Greater Than 35 To Read This

div.div: SURVIVORS
A year after the horrific shooting that killed six people and nearly ended her own life, Gabrielle Giffords returned to the scene of the crime.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R5IHKN&via=Digg&text=Gabrielle Giffords: What I Remember

div.div: ALWAYS BE CLOSING

div.a: QVC Host Collapses On Live TV, Co-Host Keeps Going

div.div: Even in the world of home shopping television, the show must go on.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SYz1hF&via=Digg&text=QVC Host Collapses On Live TV, Co-Host Keeps Going

div.div: CONVERSIONS
Hold Apple’s latest gadget for just a few minutes and you’ll marvel at the existence of such a remarkable object.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R5YvwV&via=Digg&text=The iPhone 5 Is A Miracle

div.div: BY BUILDING A MONORAIL?

div.a: How EA Keeps Its Simpsons Game Alive And Kicking

div.div: In anticipation of The Simpsons' annual Treehouse of Horror episode, EA updated its Farmville-like game to include Halloween-themed landscapes such as a cemetery, complete with zombies and zombie pets that can infect the characters in your game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TbfLx2&via=Digg&text=How EA Keeps Its Simpsons Game Alive And Kicking

div.div: SATELLITE SPOTTING

div.a: How To See SpaceX's Dragon Capsule In The Night Sky

div.div: Skywatchers in parts of North America will be able to watch the capsule chase down the International Space Station over the next few nights.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VPG0Oy&via=Digg&text=How To See SpaceX's Dragon Capsule In The Night Sky

div.div: THE ECONOMY
Jamie Fox has what is possibly Britain's most dead-end job: he walks up and down a field scaring away partridges and pheasants. But, as he says, it's better than nothing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QM07Kf&via=Digg&text=The Human Scarecrow

div.div: HE REALLY LOST IT IN GOLDENEYE
Graphic designer Brendan Dawes has visualised our data on James Bond's body count in the style of the title sequence from Dr. No

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SNEfvR&via=Digg&text=James Bond's Body Count Visualized

div.div: IMPORTANT EXPLAINERS
"How does a toilet work? Let me explain it to you by inventing a history of toilet construction."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WFJlPz&via=Digg&text=How A Toilet Works

div.div: ONLY SO MANY APPENDAGES TO BITE

div.a: Can Finger-Biting Charlie Profit From Spin-Off Series?

div.div: It’s YouTube’s most viewed viral video of all time. But does virality equal longevity?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SNh0lO&via=Digg&text=Can Finger-Biting Charlie Profit From Spin-Off Series?

div.div: LOCKED IN COMBAT
Researchers have found what they say is the only fossil ever discovered of a spider attack on prey caught in its web – a 100 million-year-old snapshot of an engagement frozen in time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tmalou&via=Digg&text=Ancient Spider Attack Fossilized

div.div: GLAM APPS

div.a: Brian Eno Releases A New Music-Making App

div.div: Pereptual innovator Brian Eno has developed a new iPad app for composing music.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UNEBEQ&via=Digg&text=Brian Eno Releases A New Music-Making App

div.div: DIETING

div.a: Injections Of Animal Cells May Get Rid Of Double Chins And Spare Tires

div.div: Injections of heat-producing cells that can burn off body fat could help dieters lose their double chins and spare tyres, following research by scientists.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R3IyHD&via=Digg&text=Injections Of Animal Cells May Get Rid Of Double Chins And Spare Tires

div.div: DRUGS, HITMEN, AND CHILD PORN

div.a: A Journey Into The Dark Corners Of The Deep Web

div.div: Make no mistake: right under your nose, just a few clicks away from any capable Internet user, is a deep, dark world of human filth and depravity that would leave even the most avid horror film buff shaking.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R8xiqo&via=Digg&text=A Journey Into The Dark Corners Of The Deep Web

div.div: SPOILERIFIC

div.a: 'Looper' Visualization Shows How Film Defies Time-Travel Genre

div.div: Seriously, if you have any intention of seeing "Looper," do not read this story. If you have seen "Looper" and loved it, enjoy. If you hated "Looper," get off our site.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QN2Ovh&via=Digg&text='Looper' Visualization Shows How Film Defies Time-Travel Genre

div.div: WEIRD SCIENCE
This paper is not actually about gettin’ laid. Though it IS about getting laid…but what it’s really about is the purpose of sleep.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q7xoiZ&via=Digg&text=Can't Sleep, Havin' Sex!

Or "10 Cities You Should Probably Avoid."

div.div: CURIOSITY UNCOVERS CURIOUS CURIO

While scooping its first samples of Martian soil, NASA’s Curiosity rover captured the image above, which shows what seems to be a small, seemingly metallic sliver or chip of… something… resting on the ground.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R8FSIF&via=Digg&text=Curiosity Finds 'Something' On Mars

div.div: GREAT FOR THE BACK

div.a: Will London Be The First City With Commuter Swim Lanes?

div.div: Two young British architects want to install a clean swimlane in one of London's abandoned industrial canals.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OjtKEo&via=Digg&text=Will London Be The First City With Commuter Swim Lanes?

div.div: LABOR WRITES

div.a: New York Times Staffers Stage Snappy Walkout

div.div: The New York Times staffers took time off from making news to make news by staging a conveniently-packaged protest outside of the Gray Lady’s building in Midtown this afternoon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGSeKP&via=Digg&text=New York Times Staffers Stage Snappy Walkout

div.div: TOPOLOGY

div.a: The Secret Ingredient In The Latest Theory Of Everything

div.div: Combine topology with symmetry and add a sprinkling of quantum mechanics. The result? A powerful new theory of everything.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SXDscA&via=Digg&text=The Secret Ingredient In The Latest Theory Of Everything

div.div: REMEMBER TO SMILE

div.a: How People Profit From Your Online Mug Shot And Ruin Your Life Forever

div.div: The early 21st century will be remembered by many images: Twitter avatars, Instagram pictures, and gifs are a few that quickly come to mind. But the mug shot is fast becoming one of the most relevant graphics of modern culture.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VRzYwO&via=Digg&text=How People Profit From Your Online Mug Shot And Ruin Your Life Forever

div.div: LET THE MEMES BEGIN

div.a: Cat Shot In The Neck With A Crossbow Is About To Rule The Internets

div.div: A Vancouver cat called Ozzy survived a crossbow shot to the neck Friday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VRTQzO&via=Digg&text=Cat Shot In The Neck With A Crossbow Is About To Rule The Internets

div.div: UGH, WHY?

div.a: Ridley Scott Just Merged The Alien And Blade Runner Universes

div.div: The Prometheus DVD/Blu-ray comes out tomorrow, in which there's the text Easter Egg shown above, which is apparently a note "dictated" by Weyland, which could only be less subtle if it said "I had a friend who used to Run Blades."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/POUysh&via=Digg&text=Ridley Scott Just Merged The Alien And Blade Runner Universes

div.div: BOAT CRASHES

div.a: Watch An Oracle Boat Taken An Epic Header In America's Cup Race

div.div: One of the most spectacularly photogenic moments came during the America’s Cup World Series on Saturday when an Oracle Team USA boat took a huge digger in one of the fleet races.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VOPcTl&via=Digg&text=Watch An Oracle Boat Taken An Epic Header In America's Cup Race
